'''Enzo Lim''' is a man who brought his family to the station after they were struck by lightning.

==History==
Enzo, his wife, and their two children went over to his mother's place to bring her supplies for the week despite the lightning storm. While his wife and children were unloading things, they were struck by lightning, so Enzo loaded them all into the back of his truck and drove them to station 19, where he got the attention of the firefighters inside. They jumped in and started CPR, which revived them. They were then loaded into aid cars and taken to the hospital.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married.

===Familial===
He and his wife have two children: Paige and a son. He, his wife, and his children bring supplies to his mother weekly.
